column2: "Na aber a Abram dzii mfe eduokron akron no
column3: EWURADZE yii noho kyerɛɛ Abram na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Emi nye Nyankopɔn Tumfo; nantsew m'enyim na dzi mu."

column2: "Na mebɛma m'ahyɛmu ada emi nye ɔwo ntamu
"Na Abram dze n'enyim boom famu: na Nyankopɔn nye no kasae see dɛ
column7: na ebɛyɛ amanaman pii hɔn egya."

column2: "Nkyii so wɔnnkɛfrɛ wo dzin Abram bio
column3: na wɔbɛfrɛ wo dzin Abraham; osiandɛ amanaman pii hɔn egya na mayɛ wo."

column2: "Na mebɛma awo mbordo
column4: na ahemfo efi wo mu epue."

column2: "Na mebɛma m'ahyɛmu etsim wɔ emi nye ɔwo nye w'asefo a wodzi w'ekyir no ntamu wɔ hɔn mbasantsen mu
column4: dɛ mebɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ama ɔwo nye w'asefo a wodzi w'ekyir no."

column2: "Na medze asaase a etsenatsena do
column5: mebɛma ɔwo nye w'asefo a wodzi w'ekyir
column6: dɛ daa enyadze; na mebɛyɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn see Abraham dɛ
column5: ɔwo nye w'asefo a wodzi w'ekyir

column2: "Iyi nye emi nye hom nye w'asefo a wodzi w'ekyir no ntamu ahyɛmu a hom nsie; hom mu mbabanyin nyinara wontwitwa hɔn twatsia."
"Na wontwitwa hom ho twatsia; na ɔbɛyɛ ahyɛmu a ɔda emi nye hom ntamu asɛnkyerɛdze."
"Na ɔbabanyin a oedzi nda awɔtwe no
column3: wontwa no twatsia wɔ hom mu
column4: mbanyin nyinara wɔ hom mbasantsen mu
column6: anaa wɔdze sika atɔ no wɔ hɔho biara hɔ a ɔmmfora w'asefo no."

column2: "Nyia wɔawo no wɔ fie no
column3: nye nyia wɔdze wo sika atɔ no
column4: wontwitwa hɔn twatsia: na m'ahyɛmu bɛtsena hɔn honam mu dɛ daa ahyɛmu."

column2: "Na ɔbanyin a wonntwaa no twatsia no
column3: dɛm nyimpa no wontwa no mfi no nkorɔfo mu; ɔato m'ahyɛmu."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn see Abraham dɛ
"Na mibehyira no
column3: ekyir yi so mebɛma enye no awo babanyin: nyew
column5: na ɔbɛyɛ amanaman hɔn na; aman ahemfo befi no mu epue."

column2: "Nna Abraham dze n'enyim boom famu
column5: Aso wɔbɔwo ba ama nyia oedzi mfe ɔha na aso Sara a oedzi mfe eduokron yi bɔwo?"

column2: "Na Abraham see Nyankopɔn dɛ
"Na Nyankopɔn see dɛ
column4: wo yer Sara bɔwo babanyin ama wo; na ebɛfrɛ ne dzin Isaak: na menye no bedzi ahyɛmu ma aayɛ daa ahyɛmu dze ama n'asefo a wodzi n'ekyir."

column2: "Na Ismael ho dze metsie wo; hwɛ
column5: na ɔadɔr mbordo; ɔbɔwo etsitsir duebien

column2: "Na m'ahyɛmu dze mebɛma oetsim wɔ emi nye Isaak a Sara bɔwo no ama wo afedan sisei ntamu."
"Na ɔnye no gyaa kasa no
column3: Nyankopɔn fii Abraham nkyɛn kɔr sor."

column2: "Na Abraham faa ne ba Ismael
column3: nye hɔn a wɔwoo hɔn wɔ ne fie
column4: nye hɔn a ɔdze ne sika tɔɔ hɔn nyinara
column5: Abraham ne fifo mu mbanyin nyinara
column6: na otwitwaa hɔn twatsia da no ara
column7: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn kaa kyerɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na aber a wotwaa Abraham twatsia no
"Na aber a ne ba Ismael wotwaa no twatsia no nna oedzi mfe du ebiasa."
"Da kor no ara na wotwitwaa Abraham nye ne ba Ismael twatsia."
"Na ne fie mbanyin nyinara
column3: hɔn a wɔwoo hɔn wɔ fie
column4: nye hɔn a wɔdze sika totɔɔ hɔn ahɔho hɔ
column5: wɔka no ho ma wotwitwaa hɔn twatsia."
